entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:32 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023
